desc: Glamorous designer industrial-chic light fixtures, including chandeliers, pendants, sconces, and linear suspensions hand made in Brooklyn, USA. Custom sizes available. For home, restaurants, and shimmering LED lights for co-working spaces.

layout.text:
UNIQUE, ARTISTIC, HANDMADE CHANDELIERS
LINEAR SUSPENSIONS, PENDANTS, LAMPS
AND CUSTOM LIGHTING THAT CELEBRATE
MATERIALS, CONTRAST  & COMPLEXITY
